entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of drizzle. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low plus 1.
